bill.summary:
Emergency Housing Assistance for Older Adults Act of 2020
This bill authorizes additional assistance for supportive housing for the elderly.
Among other things, the bill authorizes additional rental assistance for low-income elderly persons and additional grants to certain federally assisted housing projects to provide service coordinators to prevent, prepare for, or respond to the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) public health emergency.
